condition.narrative: Agreed interim Financial Reports within 45 days after each financial year quarter.
Annual audited financial statements within six months after the year-end
Project Reports shall cover the period of six months and shall be furnished not later than one month after the end of the periodcovered by such report
The recipient shall cause MOEVT, not later than six months after the effective date to appoint the independent auditors.
